Stitch Fix Engineering & Analytics

We Are Hiring

Stitch Fix is an early stage startup building a disruptive, data-driven, retail platform. We have gobs of paying customers and things are growing fast. We're currently a small, senior dev & analytics team based in SF - but we'd like to add some more talented folks.

If you want to come build awesome products and solve interesting problems with a kick-ass group of people check out our culture, our team, the perks, and apply for one of our open positions.

Our Culture

  • ▶ Playing
  •  Coding
  • 💡 Thinking
  •  Dataing
  •  Coffeeing
Building something simple and beautiful is the most important task.

We get stuff done. We have fun. We test. We learn. We work well together. We drink beer and sip nice whiskey. We're big thinkers. We care about the product we are building. We push boundaries.

We love what we do & We take the time to do it right.

A sample of things we're working on

  • Designing / building responsive interfaces that are device and screen-size agnostic.
  • Applying Machine Learning solutions to strengthen our recommendation algorithm.
  • Increasing the current utilization rate of physical inventory.
  • Building prediction models to accurately determine our inventory for future dates.
